title: Juice Wrld Interview and More
itunes:title: Juice Wrld Interview and More
description:
Today's show we had Juice Wrld stop by, where he spoke about cutting people off, heartbreak, touring with Nicki Minaj and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Kodak Black after his comments about shooting his shot to Lauren London after her losing her partner Nipsey Hussle, which we had to turn into a topic and see what our listeners thought about it the whole situation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
